description:
We know you're short on time, so we've cut out the fluff, so you can get to the core of what you need to know successfully plan, execute, measure, and analyze the highest-ROI tactics in social media marketing.

1. Gain a deep understanding and knowledge of the latest trends in social media marketing in 90 minutes.
2. Start becoming an expert in the hottest trends in digital-from Pinterest to Google+ to Local/Mobile.
3. Become an invaluable asset to your organization by knowing which social media tactics work.
4. Improve your organization's digital marketing performance-drive more leads, revenue, and results.
5. Put your newly acquired skills and knowledge into action immediately.
title: Social Media Marketing Crash Course
